trends: There have been no other sightings in Monroe
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy girlfriend and i was going to visit here older brother in richfeild ut we were leaving from elsinore about 10pm. we were driving east bound leaving elsinore an seen a light wut looked like on the mountain. i told my gf that it was hella cold to be on the mountain. we was watching the light assend up the mountain. once it was to the horizon of cove mountain, we seen another light rise from the base of the mountain at this time i was nearly to a stop on the highway. my girlfriend told me i could pull over to watch. so i pulled into the auction between elsinore and richfield facing east. the first light then was above he horizon and the other light was still assending the mountain once the first light was a good distance above the horizon, it dissapeard. as did the rest of the lights that apeared to rise from the base of the mountain another guy driving pulled over and watched it also.i called my brother who lives closer to the mountain an he had seen it also along with his girlfriend. after all the lights went out we continued to my girlfriends brothers house in richfeild we dont know wut they were my girlfriend is a big non beliver and she was very confused on wut it was she even thought it could be weather balloons. if anyone else seen or knows about these lights please update me on the info thanx
Summary: at first we thought that somone was on the mountain wit a bright light but 5 more appeared from ground level the base of the mountain
